description: This file defines API routes for managing and retrieving exercise data using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for fetching all exercises with optional filters and fetching a specific exercise by ID.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI's router class used to define route groups

methods.name: List[ExerciseResponse] get_exercises( primary_muscle: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by primary muscle group"), equipment: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by equipment name"), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve list of exercises with optional filtering by muscle group and equipment

methods.name: ExerciseResponse get_exercise_by_id( exercise_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific exercise by its ID

ctags.name: get_exercises
ctags.signature: ( primary_muscle: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by primary muscle group"), equipment: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by equipment name"), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
